newsitem.title: USA: Mackie Designs sees lower Q4 earnings.
newsitem.headline: Mackie Designs sees lower Q4 earnings.

text.p: Mackie Designs Inc, a designer and manufacturer of professional audio equipment, said on Wednesday it expected its earnings to come out lower than expected by financial analysts for fourth quarter 1996.
The company said it was "primarily due to the delayed introduction of the 40-8 large-format mixing board and M-1200 and M-1400 power amplifiers" in light of production delays earlier in the year.
It said it expected the products to come out early in the fourth quarter.
The company did not say what the estimate was for the fourth quarter.
Mackie Designs had a pro forma of $0.10 per share for the third quarter against $0.16 for the same period last year.
